112.content:
Your name is Jason and you just came home after a long day at school. Sure, things can't be too bad in the fourth grade, but things can get boring after enduring the same old lesson about math and language arts.

Then you also had to put up with the bigger kids bugging you and making fun of you all the time, not to mention all the silly girls who were always trying to get your attention. Then there were the teachers, bogging you down with all that pesky homework all the time. Ugh!

So you get off the school bus and you stumble your way into the bedroom. You get some juice to drink before you sit at your desk and look over your calendar book. Good, you only had some math homework to do for the next day.

You quickly work through the math homework and you read a few pages from a book and you answer the questions in a notebook. Done!

You change into a t-shirt and shorts before you crawl in bed for your nice, afternoon nap. You doze off as soon as your head hits the nice, soft pillow....

"Jason! Jason!"

You wake up groggily and you see another kid standing next to your bed!

"Uhh... Who... Who are you?" you mumble.

The kid has black hair and blue eyes and he's wearing a long, white robe with rope tied around his waist. He looks like he's also ten years old, just like you.

"Jason! I'm God! I need to ask you a favor!" the boy replies.

You quickly sit up on your bed. Say what? Who is this guy? God?

"You're who? How did you get in my room? Why are you here?" you ask him.

"I'm God! I have chosen you to receive my powers! I got some stuff to do on other galaxies, so I need you to be omnipotent, okay?" God said.

"Uhh... what does that mean?" you wonder.

"It means... You can do anything, just by thinking it or wishing it! I will be around in case you need me! Bye!"

Then God disappeared from your room!

Suddenly, you wake up from your nap with a startle!

"What the heck?"

You look over at your desk and you see a note written on the desk.

"Thanks, Jason! -God"

"Whoa!"

So, you're omnipotent now!

What are you gonna do next?

You decided to visit your best friend, Tom, who is also age 8, the same age as you. Now that you got God-powers, you can just snap your fingers and teleport over to his house in an instant! No need to walk, skateboard or ride your bike over to his house.

“Easy! I gained god-powers! I can do everything!” you say with a big grin on your face.

“Bullshit!” he sneers with his arms folded.

“Okay, don’t believe me!” you giggle as you wave your hand. “You’re weightless!”

Instantly, Tom’s feet leave the ground. He starts floating around his room like a balloon.

“WHAAH! JASON! What’s going on?” he screams.

“Like I said, I got powers. I just ordered you to become completely weightless, like you’re on the moon… only lighter!” you respond.

“P-p-please put me down!!!” Tom pleads with you as he floats a foot above his bed.

“No! You gotta learn to trust me, Tom!” you say with a stern tone as you open his bedroom window. “You’re going to float around outside for five minutes before I teleport you back in here so you can learn a lesson!”

“What? NO!” he shouts.

But you inhale deeply and then blow air at him, forcing his weightless body to glide through the open window. Once outside, he floats higher and higher into the air as the wind takes him away and carries him over the streets above the city.

“NOOOO!!! JASON!!” he shouts as you watch from the bedroom window. It’s funny watching a teenage boy float around outside, not being held by anything.

Eventually, Tom gets used to floating around and he just looks around and watches the ground from high above the sky.

After 5 minutes, you teleport him back into his room and you close the window. You end his weightlessness.

“There! Did you have fun?” you ask him.

“Uhh… I… I had to get used to it…” Tom sighed.

“So, what would you like me to change about you, dude?” you ask your friend.

He ponders for a moment before he replies…

I was working on my computer and you know how I like having my headphones on when I really get going, so I didn’t hear it then and didn’t see it till I got up this morning. There, are you happy?”

“Well now that you mention it,” you said while tapping your finger on your chin and looking up at the ceiling, “Yes.”

Vanessa rolled her eyes while you sat down, then she said, “I’m so happy that you managed to finish unpacking during the course of that soda and 5- hour Energy fueled marathon session.” She said it deadpan though and had already returned to typing on her computer.

She did take a moment to slide your usual latte and donut across the table. The sudden influx of sugar and caffeine did much to put a bit of extra pep in your step. With half of both gone, you turned your attention to the other patrons of the coffee shop that had become one of your favorite spots since you had gotten your new apartment.

“You should come by sometime, check the place out,” you said.

“Pass, it was bad enough going to that dump when you were first looking for a place.”

“Oh come on, it isn’t that bad,” you started, but a stern glance from Vanessa made you admit, “Fine, it’s pretty bad, but you know I didn’t have that much money. I had to take what I could get.”

“You could have taken me up on my offer, you know.”

You shook your head, “No, not with that Genki girl you’ve already got living with you. Way too hyper for me.” Vanessa shrugged even though you knew that Rei got on her nerves as well.

“Oh, not again,” you heard Vanessa mutter.

“What?” you asked, wondering just what she was talking about.

“You’re staring at him again,” she responded. This stirred you out of your thoughts and you saw that you had indeed been staring at a young man across the room, the same one that often attracted your gaze. “He’s probably going to think you’re a creep or something if you keep that up.”

You shook your head and tore your gaze away from Alex. You had encountered the tall brunet several times and found that the two of you shared a number of interests.

“Why don’t you see if he wants to go on a date with you?” Vanessa asked. You glared at her till she looked up and saw it, then she seemed to remember who she was talking to, “Oh right, not a girl, sorry. Guess you’re going to have to find someone else.”

“Yeah,” you said dejectedly. Despite yourself, you turned your gaze towards Alex again and said wistfully, “I kind of wish he was a woman though.”

As you said that, there was a bright flash centered on Alex. When the light cleared, Alex was gone, or at least you thought so. In his place sat a woman with the same color hair, wearing the same jeans and shirt, and eating the same muffin and drinking the same coffee as Alex had been.

“Why don’t you see if she wants to go on a day with you?” Vanessa asked, missing your slack jawed expression.

Shaking your head, you asked, “Who are you talking about?”

Your friend scoffed, “Alex, the same girl you’ve been pining for since you met her.”

If your jaw dropped any lower, it would have been sitting in your lap at this point. What in the world was going on here: Alex had been a guy that you felt attracted to, but not enough to overcome the whole gender thing. Now just one random comment and now he was a she and Vanessa didn't know what had happened. It didn't look like anyone else noticed anything weird either.

Hmm…I wonder… you mused as you rubbed your chin.

You made several more attempts, switching Alex back and forth from male to female and back again. And each time your conversation with Vanessa repeated just the same. It didn’t even seem that you had to do anything like say or think “I wish” or anything, just as long as you concentrated enough on something you wanted to change, it happened with no one else the wiser. You felt a wide grin cross your face as you considered what you could do. First things first though, there was something else you wanted to change about the now feminine Alex.
1231.title: The start of something grand

choices: It’s an average fast food joint.
12311.content:
Looking over the “new” Alex, you thought she could do with a bit more meat on her bones. With just a bit of concentration, gone was the slender brunette, and in her place was a much curvier version. Her shirt was now stretched around plump breasts and a meaty stomach, while her pants hugged thick thighs and a round rump. Getting up from the table, popping the rest of your donut into your mouth, and grabbing your coffee, you walked over.

From behind, you heard Vanessa mutter, “About time…”

Ignoring that comment as well as the barb that almost slipped from your tongue, you instead tried to keep your heart from thundering out of your chest as you came closer to the rather ravishing creature before you.

“Is this seat taken?” you asked.

Alex looked up with a quizzical slant to her eyebrows before saying, “No, go ahead.”

Thanking her, you slipped into the seat. Alex cocked her head and her lips parted slightly as she continued to stare at you.

As you were about to ask what was up, she instead asked, “Sarah…right?” You smiled and nodded, and she went on, “Sorry about that, I was…somewhere else.” She motioned down to her tablet.

After some minutes of further small talk, you had figured out that this Alex was almost identical to before except for the obvious differences. The interests the two of you had shared were still the same. In fact, you noticed that she liked a few more things that you did now as well. After a while though, you also noted that she seemed a bit distracted, looking up towards the counter with a hungry look to her face.

“Do you want something to eat?” you asked.

Alex jumped slightly as you broke her trance before nodding. “I really shouldn’t be having anything else though,” she said with a grimace as she flicked a finger towards the plate with the muffin crumbs beside her.

“Nonsense, if you’re hungry, you should eat something,” you told her. “Come on, I know a place around the corner that you can get something filling.”

Alex didn’t follow you to stand at first, her full lips turning downward as she nibbled on the lower one. She gave a sudden sharp nod of her head and hopped to her feet after several moments. You gave a quick good-bye to Vanessa who returned it with a subtle thumbs up as you led Alex out the door and into the bustling city street beyond. Alex’s tablet was hidden away in her car before you continued the short trip around the corner to the waiting food. You could see that she was already licking her lips in anticipation before she could even see the place.
12311.title: Making her a buxom babe

choices: You don’t really care if she’s submissive, you like it.
You’re unsure about this side of her.
You dislike this part of her, you would rather her be more assertive.
123111.content:
“How did I never see this little place?” Alex wondered aloud as the pair of you made your way through the bustling crowd of people.

She smiled with a twinkle in her eyes as you held the door open for her. She thanked you for that as you followed her in, though your chivalrous act also had the benefit of allowing you to sneak a good peek at her rounded rump.

The air was thick with the smells of fried food mingling with simmering gravy and other heavy sauces. As you came up beside Alex, you saw she was frowning slightly as she chewed on the inside of her cheek. She seemed torn between having something to eat, while also knowing what such hearty fare would do to her already substantial body.

Undaunted, you lightly took her arm and led her over to one of the booths. When the waitress came by, rather than taking the offered menus, you went ahead and ordered for the both of you already: one of their biggest burgers with a side of gravy covered fries for Alex, while you went simpler with a hot dog with coleslaw. You also took the liberty of ordering a chocolate milkshake for Alex.

The waitress jotted down the order and took off, leaving the two of you alone again. Alex chewed on her lip and blinked quickly, in an obvious state of worry.

Before she could say anything, you butted in, “Is there something the matter, Alex? If you wanted something different, I could–“

Alex cut you off with a shake of her head, sending her waves of hair swishing back and forth. “No, that’s fine, I’m surprised that you ordered all that for me.”

She flashed you a smile, but it was fragile at best. Alex started to come out of her shell again though as the two of you waited. Before long, you came to a conclusion: Alex was being rather submissive to you. You weren’t sure whether you had missed that part of Alex’s personality because of the limited interactions, or if it was something that was part of the new feminine Alex.
123111.title: The greasy spoon

choices: You went for the top with a penthouse apartment.
The top wasn’t high enough so you swap for a palatial estate.
Not wanting to be too flashy, you upgrade to a much nicer studio apartment.
1231111.content:
You couldn’t suppress a quick grin at that. A submissive Alex was even better than you could have hoped for. The more you thought about it, the more you were certain you would have made that change if she hadn’t been that way already.

“Something funny?” Alex asked.

“No, no, just thinking that we should have done this before. I like this.”

Alex looked down at the table, a hint of a blush showing and a slight curl to her lips. “So do I,” she admitted after a bit.

The food arrived soon after. Alex’s eyes went wide at seeing the size of the meal you had ordered for her. She hesitated for a bit before digging in. Her eating surprised you. She ate faster than you were expecting, yet she was very neat about it as well, making sure that not a single crumb escaped her mouth. She kept looking up at you as well, as if making sure that you were watching her eat so well.

Another smile crossed your face as a thought occurred to you. As quick as you could, you ate the coleslaw. Then you shoved the plate with the hotdog across the table towards Alex. Her eyebrows shot up for a moment before she pulled the plate a bit closer.

Bite after bite, she worked at the food. It became clear that she was slowing down though. Just as obvious though was how she was pushing on regardless to please you. With one final slurp, she drained the last of the milkshake before her cheeks bulged. She looked like she would be sick for a moment, but instead let out a thunderous belch that drew more than a little attention. Alex clapped a hand to her mouth, her eyes going wide before she gave a little giggle.

And then came time to pay the bill. It would have been a problem before, but a little bit of concentration and your money issues were a thing of the past. Next, you had to help Alex to her feet. You noted with some enjoyment how her belly was peeking out from under her shirt; a lovely crescent of flesh on display. You couldn’t help letting a hand stray down to caress the exposed bit as you helped her out the door. Alex let out a little pleased moan under her breath as you continued.

“So…do you want to come back to my place?” you asked, careful to not let your excitement at the prospect show through all the way.

Alex looked torn for a moment, chewing on the inside of her lip, before she gave a tiny nod. You smiled before leading her to your car. Before you got there though, you used your powers to replace the jalopy that you came in with something a bit sportier and much better maintained. After assuring her that her car would be fine, you started to get in yourself. However, you realized that the “dump” as Vanessa called it wasn’t at all suited for someone with your abilities. With a bit of concentration, you took care of that issue as well.
1231111.title: Exerting control

choices: You take her to the bedroom and stuff her some more.
You invite her out to the pool for some fun there.
Using your ability, you make some further changes right now.
12311111.content:
After following the directions to your new home from the GPS, you helped Alex out of the car and into the elevator. At the top, you stepped across the small entryway and used a key that hadn’t been on your key ring before to let yourself in. You heard Alex gasp beside you. You shared her shock though you wouldn’t let her know that. Even what little you could see from the front door took your breath away. Bright and airy, it was a far cry from the dingy little hole in the wall that you had before. There was some art placed around, but not as much as you were expecting. It looked fantastic for that though, making good use of the space without being overwhelming.

“Wow, didn’t know you were this rich,” Alex mumbled, her eyes wide and swiveling everywhere.

“What can I say, I’m full of surprises…almost like you,” you replied while reaching down to caress her belly.

A blush spread up her neck and into her cheeks again, but she made no move to stop you. With more than a little regret, you pulled away anyways. You then proceeded to take her on a little tour of the glamorous surroundings. She seemed the most taken with the rooftop terrace with the sunken pool and hot tub. She even hinted about trying them out another time. The thought of Alex all wet in a little bikini was enough to put your heart in your throat. You somehow managed to recover enough to finish off the tour.

By the time the two of you returned to the main area of the penthouse, she had recovered for the most part. She didn’t need to support herself against you, and she wasn’t in a constant state of cradling her stomach.

“Very impressive…but…I got the sense…that you didn’t bring me here just for a…tour,” she said with a lusty grin and tracing her hand up across your torso.

“Well, in fact, I did have something else in mind,” you responded with a grin of your own.

“Oh?” she asked.
12311111.title: A palace in the sky

124.title: Adult

choices: Quantum distortion and probability physics, and they're working on something new

1241.content:
You straightened your shirt one last time and pushed on through the double doors and stepped into your future. This was where you'd work for the rest of your life (you fervently hoped, anyway!).

The room was high ceilinged, white, and spread wide in all directions, with little blocking sight. It was like a warehouse with gadgets piled everywhere. Workstations. Large machinery. Things that went 'Bzzzzt'. They had it all. And now they had you!

"Miss Lenton?" a voice said from your left.

You turned and saw a short guy with a clipboard who glanced up at you. Yeah, being a hair over six feet tall sometimes made people annoyed with you. You'd learned to not pick on people due to their height based deficiencies.

"Hmm? Oh, call me Mel, everyone does." you say, smiling widely.

The smile was not returned.

"Report to Miss Alonzo. Area fifteen." he said, waving over to a large selection of benches with a '15' label on a signpost.

"Okay." you say, but the man had already turned away and was poring over his clipboard.

Rude little man! Attempting to ignore the slight you headed off where he indicated. It was certainly an involved area. Glancing at the neighboring zones you did feel a little odd. Most places you'd seen were cordoned off, separating different labs. This was all under one roof with no boundaries. Odd. Still best see where you've been assigned.
1241.title: Melissa Lenton, 22. Lab geek wanabe.

choices: Leo has turned into a baby.

12431.content:
You were in bed trying to get some sleep when your 10-year-old son Leo walked in "MOM I CAN'T SLEEP" he shouted in a frustrated tone. You Honestly didn't have the strength to deal with him at this time of night as you had work the next morning "ok sweety, you can sleep with mommy tonight" you said while trying not to get angry with him "yay" he cheered while jumping under the covers and burying his face in your bosom.

It only took a few minutes for him to fall asleep and while you were dozing off you couldn't help but think back to the simpler times when he was just a tiny baby inside your womb and as you finally start to lose consciousness you can't help but notice a strange sensation in your belly but decide to ignore it and go to sleep.

You opened your eyes to a fresh morning, luckily you had naturally woken up just minutes before your alarm clock was supposed to go off. You try to sit up but find that it's extremely difficult and that's when you notice that your belly was huge but before you could question the situation you began to feel the immediate need to pee.

You ran to the toilet and just made it in time to urinate and now with more time to look at yourself you somehow subconsciously know that you had somehow wished your son back into your womb.

12433.title: Kim or Kelly?

Lyla Ward, a complete hard ass fitness nut
124332.content:
“How are you feeling?” Vanessa asked without looking up from her book.

“Well, my eyebrows don’t hurt,” you managed to pant out.

“You might want to work on that.”

“I thought that was what I was doing,” you grumbled back.

“Funny, I thought you were torturing yourself.”

“Is there a difference at this point?”

Vanessa shrugged her shoulders as you slumped to the floor. Your shaky legs were no longer able to support you. You didn’t even want to be doing this, but the constant harassment had gotten to you again. Now you found yourself soaked in sweat with muscles you didn’t even know you had aching like never before, and all with no discernible progress. How long had you been starving yourself and working out like no tomorrow? You couldn’t even remember at this point.

You wanted like crazy to scarf down a burger and fries, washing it down with a huge jug of soda. That was why you had convinced Vanessa to come with you whenever you came to the gym: to act as the angel on your shoulder and keep you from doing that. You shouldn’t have been surprised that she applied as much enthusiasm for that task as she did to almost everything else in life. Perched on an unused weight bench, the violet-haired young woman had her nose buried in one of her typical occult books.

Despite that, she still managed to spot something you hadn’t. “Uh-oh, here comes trouble.”

You turned your gaze back and forth trying to find out what she meant, despite the spasm that gripped your back. You were only able to half stifle a swear when you saw who Vanessa meant.
124332.title: Kelly's lack of progress
